meanings.definition: Scatter or distribute small drops or particles over something.
meanings.sent1: She sprinkled sugar on top of the cookies.
meanings.sent2: The chef sprinkled herbs on the pasta for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel sprinkled nuts all over the yard.
meanings.sent4: The stars sprinkled the night sky with their twinkling light.
meanings.sent5: The gentle rain sprinkled the garden with much-needed water.

meanings.definition: Cover (an object or surface) with small drops or particles of a substance.
meanings.sent1: He sprinkled glitter on the birthday card for a festive touch.
meanings.sent2: The baker sprinkled powdered sugar on the freshly baked donuts.
meanings.sent3: The artist sprinkled paint on the canvas, creating a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The magician sprinkled magic dust over the crowd, making them gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent5: The snowfall sprinkled the town with a blanket of white.
